content.prompt: In the last sentence of the first paragraph, the author repeats the word “presumably” in order to

choices.label: portray the difficulty of assessing the moral quality of a nation’s actions
remind the audience that they cannot be sure they understand people’s motivations
undermine a view that he will go on to dispute in his argument
emphasize the vast power imbalance between those fighting in the described conflicts

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain ways claims are qualified through modifiers, counterarguments, and alternative perspectives.
